menu.title: Fitness Menu
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to preparing dishes: more fresh vegetables and fruits. Designed for active and healthy individuals. It is an entirely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Post Menu
menu.descr: The 'Post' menu involves a careful selection of ingredients: complete absence of animal products, almond, oat, coconut, or buckwheat milk, the right amount of proteins through tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Premium Menu
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design but also high-quality dish execution. Salmon, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
